original_title: Bad Boys Get Spanked and Then Fucked
overview: The passions of wicked young men and their inherent need for punishment are delectably accentuated in Bad Boys Get Spanked And Then Fucked. Submitting ever so willingly to the euphoric pleasure that only the slap of a hand or the crack of a whip can offer, these naughty little things take their punishment as only bad boys can. Bad Boys Get Spanked features a series of hard-hitting vignettes designed to make even the most virtuous of young men crave the attention that only bad boys get! Cast: Johnny Hazzard, Brenn Wyson, Austin Wilde, Brock Armstrong, Dean Monroe, Drake Jaden, Matthew Rush, Michael Dora, Mick Gibson, Tristan Sterling
title: Bad Boys Get Spanked and Then Fucked
